net.theblackchamber.crypto.util

Class SecurePropertiesUtils2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.theblackchamber.crypto.util.SecurePropertiesUtils2

  • public class SecurePropertiesUtils2
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to provide an easy way to take a clear text properties file and encrypt it.
    Author:
    sminogue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurePropertiesUtils2() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      NOTE: The encryption related properties need to be properly set prior to using this.
      static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties, java.lang.String keyPath)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      Note: Encryption fields passed as parameters WILL NOT be placed into the resulting SecureProperties file.
      static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties, java.lang.String keyPath, boolean retainCrytoConfigProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public SecurePropertiesUtils2()

    • Method Detail

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties)
                                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.security.KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        NOTE: The encryption related properties need to be properly set prior to using this. key-path
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        java.io.IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        java.security.KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties,
                                                      java.lang.String keyPath)
                                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.security.KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        Note: Encryption fields passed as parameters WILL NOT be placed into the resulting SecureProperties file.
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        keyPath - Path to the keystore file.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        java.io.IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        java.security.KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties2 encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties,
                                                      java.lang.String keyPath,
                                                      boolean retainCrytoConfigProperties)
                                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.security.KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        keyPath - Path to the keystore file.
        retainCrytoConfigProperties - Boolean to indicate if the encryption field parameters should be stored in the resulting SecureProperties file. True they will be, False they wont.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        java.io.IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        java.security.KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.
